title: Echoes of a Lost Age
goal: Deepen Eldrin's disorientation and hint at the pervasive nature of the Shadow Blight, as Lyra reluctantly aids him.
stakes_shift: The blight is revealed not merely as an ancient memory but an active, corrupting force in the present, demanding immediate attention.

bridge.from_prev: Eldrin and Lyra have made a wary, uncertain alliance.
bridge.to_next: Eldrin accepts his responsibility to investigate the blight, however limited his current power.

sections.title: Memories Like Smoke
sections.intent: Show Eldrin's struggle with memory and the vast gap between his time and the present.

scenes.summary: Eldrin tries to piece together his fragmented memories, finding the world around him utterly alien, save for echoes of ancient power.
scenes.outcome: Eldrin understands the immense passage of time and the loss of his historical context.

sections.title: A Reluctant Guide
sections.intent: Lyra begins to share her observations, subtly guiding Eldrin and revealing more about the local area.

scenes.summary: Lyra, though still wary, shares observations of strange phenomena in the nearby forests, pragmatic concerns outweighing her fear.
scenes.outcome: Lyra reluctantly agrees to guide Eldrin, sharing local knowledge of unusual occurrences.

sections.title: The Blight's Touch
sections.intent: Provide the first direct, undeniable manifestation of the Shadow Blight's corrupting influence.

scenes.summary: They discover a patch of forest where trees are twisted and grey, and wildlife behaves unnaturally, a clear sign of unnatural decay.
scenes.outcome: Eldrin and Lyra witness a direct, unsettling manifestation of the Shadow Blight's corrupting power.

sections.title: Ancient Whispers, Modern Fears
sections.intent: Eldrin connects the blight to ancient lore, while Lyra reacts with modern fear and skepticism.

scenes.summary: Eldrin recognizes the blight's signature from ancient texts, attempting to explain its nature to a skeptical but increasingly concerned Lyra.
scenes.outcome: Eldrin identifies the blight as a known ancient threat, deepening Lyra's apprehension.
